channel.title: WAC on Robert Quimbey's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in WAC on Robert Quimbey's Blog

item.title: Windows Admin Center Modernized Gateway & Pure Storage FlashArray
item.description: Microsoft recently released a major update to Windows Admin Center (WAC). It was originally titled the “Modernized Gateway” and by GA it was simply the “v2 Gateway”. Speed is the biggest improvement with page loading times now 2-10x faster. A major change was moving to .NET Core from the .NET Framework which broke all existing extensions. Pure Storage released an update to our FlashArray extension right before Christmas (2024). more…..
